title: Runes Reforged for Akali

embed.description: Hey guys, new Runes are out and I thought I'd just share my first thoughts on them with you. Unfortunately I don't have access to PBE so I don't know the minor changes to the runes but the general concept of the single runes will basically be the same.

body:
Hey guys, I made a video on the new Runes for Akali explaining the strengths and weaknesses of the different trees.
I am a Diamond 4 Akali One Trick and if you want to learn something about Akali and the new runes, I would be thankful if you'd check my video
and listen my ideas on the new Runes. This video mainly covers Domination and Sorcery Tree because these two are the best two for assassins and the video also was much longer than expected.
